text:
@SpeakerPelosi As you know, tr*mp has ordered U.S. hospitals to send their data on #COVID19 patients to the political hacks at @HHSGov instead of the professionals at @CDCgov.  This will enable the tr*mp regime to hide data and lie even more about the pandemic.

What is your reaction to this? https://t.co/C7iNLqCUi7
